verses.verse: These <WH428> are the words <WH1697> of the covenant, <WH1285> which the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> to make <WH3772> with the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> beside <WH905> the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> he made <WH3772> with them in Horeb. <WH2722>

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> to all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> and said <WH559> to them, You have seen <WH7200> all <WH3605> that the LORD <WH3068> did <WH6213> before your eyes <WH5869> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and to all <WH3605> his servants, <WH5650> and to all <WH3605> his land; <WH776>
The great <WH1419> temptations <WH4531> which <WH834> your eyes <WH5869> have seen, <WH7200> the signs, <WH226> and those <WH1992> great <WH1419> miracles: <WH4159>
Yet the LORD <WH3068> has not given <WH5414> you an heart <WH3820> to perceive, <WH3045> and eyes <WH5869> to see, <WH7200> and ears <WH241> to hear, <WH8085> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And I have led <WH3212> you forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness: <WH4057> your clothes <WH8008> are not waxen old <WH1086> on you, and your shoe <WH5275> is not waxen old <WH1086> on your foot. <WH7272>
You have not eaten <WH398> bread, <WH3899> neither <WH3808> have you drunk <WH8354> wine <WH3196> or strong drink: <WH7941> that you might know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

And when you came <WH935> to this <WH2088> place, <WH4725> Sihon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> came <WH3318> out against <WH7125> us to battle, <WH4421> and we smote <WH5221> them:

And we took <WH3947> their land, <WH776> and gave <WH5414> it for an inheritance <WH5159> to the Reubenites, <WH7206> and to the Gadites, <WH1425> and to the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh. <WH4520>
Keep <WH8104> therefore the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> covenant, <WH1285> and do <WH6213> them, that you may prosper <WH7919> in all <WH3605> that you do. <WH6213>

You stand <WH5324> this day <WH3117> all <WH3605> of you before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God; <WH430> your captains <WH7218> of your tribes, <WH7626> your elders, <WH2205> and your officers, <WH7860> with all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Israel, <WH3478>
Your little <WH2945> ones, your wives, <WH802> and your stranger <WH1616> that is in your camp, <WH4264> from the hewer <WH2404> of your wood <WH6086> to the drawer <WH7579> of your water: <WH4325>

That you should enter <WH5674> into covenant <WH1285> with the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and into his oath, <WH423> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> makes <WH3772> with you this day: <WH3117>

That he may establish <WH6965> you to day <WH3117> for a people <WH5971> to himself, and that he may be to you a God, <WH430> as he has said <WH1696> to you, and as he has sworn <WH7650> to your fathers, <WH1> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob. <WH3290>
Neither <WH3808> with you only <WH905> do I make <WH3772> this <WH2063> covenant <WH1285> and this <WH2063> oath; <WH423>
But with him that stands <WH5975> here <WH6311> with us this day <WH3117> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> and also with him that is not here <WH6311> with us this day: <WH3117>

(For you know <WH3045> how <WH834> we have dwelled <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Egypt; <WH4714> and how <WH834> we came <WH5674> through <WH7130> the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> you passed <WH5674> by;
And you have seen <WH7200> their abominations, <WH8251> and their idols, <WH1544> wood <WH6086> and stone, <WH68> silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> which <WH834> were among them:)

Lest <WH6435> there should be among you man, <WH376> or <WH176> woman, <WH802> or <WH176> family, <WH4940> or <WH176> tribe, <WH7626> whose <WH834> heart <WH3824> turns <WH6437> away this day <WH3117> from the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> to go <WH3212> and serve <WH5647> the gods <WH430> of these <WH1992> nations; <WH1471> lest <WH6435> there should be among you a root <WH8328> that bears <WH6509> gall <WH7219> and wormwood; <WH3939>

And it come <WH1961> to pass, when he hears <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> curse, <WH423> that he bless <WH1288> himself in his heart, <WH3824> saying, <WH559> I shall have peace, <WH7965> though <WH3588> I walk <WH3212> in the imagination <WH8307> of my heart, <WH3820> to add <WH5595> drunkenness <WH7302> to thirst: <WH6771>

The LORD <WH3068> will not spare <WH5545> him, but then <WH227> the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> and his jealousy <WH7068> shall smoke <WH6225> against that man, <WH376> and all <WH3605> the curses <WH423> that are written <WH3789> in this <WH2088> book <WH5612> shall lie <WH7257> on him, and the LORD <WH3068> shall blot <WH4229> out his name <WH8034> from under <WH8478> heaven. <WH8064>

And the LORD <WH3068> shall separate <WH914> him to evil <WH7451> out of all <WH3605> the tribes <WH7626> of Israel, <WH3478> according to all <WH3605> the curses <WH423> of the covenant <WH1285> that are written <WH3789> in this <WH2088> book <WH5612> of the law: <WH8451>

So that the generation <WH1755> to come <WH314> of your children <WH1121> that shall rise <WH6965> up after <WH310> you, and the stranger <WH5237> that shall come <WH935> from a far <WH7350> land, <WH776> shall say, <WH559> when they see <WH7200> the plagues <WH4347> of that land, <WH776> and the sicknesses <WH8463> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> has laid <WH2470> on it;

And that the whole <WH3605> land <WH776> thereof is brimstone, <WH1614> and salt, <WH4417> and burning, <WH8316> that it is not sown, <WH2232> nor <WH3808> bears, <WH6779> nor <WH3808> any <WH3605> grass <WH6212> grows <WH5927> therein, like the overthrow <WH4114> of Sodom, <WH5467> and Gomorrah, <WH6017> Admah, <WH126> and Zeboim, <WH6636> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> overthrew <WH2015> in his anger, <WH639> and in his wrath: <WH2534>

Even all <WH3605> nations <WH1471> shall say, <WH559> Why <WH5921> <WH4100> has the LORD <WH3068> done <WH6213> thus <WH3660> to this <WH2063> land? <WH776> what <WH4100> means the heat <WH2750> of this <WH2088> great <WH1419> anger? <WH639>

Then men shall say, <WH559> Because <WH5921> <WH834> they have forsaken <WH5800> the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of their fathers, <WH1> which <WH834> he made <WH3772> with them when he brought <WH3318> them forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt: <WH4714>

For they went <WH3212> and served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and worshipped <WH7812> them, gods <WH430> whom <WH834> they knew <WH3045> not, and whom <WH834> he had not given <WH2505> to them:

And the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> against this <WH1931> land, <WH776> to bring <WH935> on it all <WH3605> the curses <WH7045> that are written <WH3789> in this <WH2088> book: <WH5612>

And the LORD <WH3068> rooted <WH5428> them out of their land <WH127> in anger, <WH639> and in wrath, <WH2534> and in great <WH1419> indignation, <WH7110> and cast <WH7993> them into <WH413> another <WH312> land, <WH776> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

The secret <WH5641> things belong to the LORD <WH3068> our God: <WH430> but those things which are revealed <WH1540> belong to us and to our children <WH1121> for ever, <WH5769> that we may do <WH6213> all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of this <WH2063> law. <WH8451>
